reviews.text: Splishin' and A Splashin' Pools Splishin' and A Splashin' Pools 2000 Whitley Rd C330, Keller, TX 76248
Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"I have used this company twice and have had excellent service." "Graham and Adam are super nice people to work with." "I love doing business with small business owners."

If anyone that is in need of a good service done to their pool. They are up front with there pricing no B.S and do a fine job. Believe me my pool is crystal clear and communication is also A+ is a veteran ran business. You can’t go wrong and this coming from a veteran who loves attention to detail Response from the owner 8 months ago Thank you for letting us service your pool and the kind review. Thank you for your service from one vetern to another.

Graham and Adam are super nice people to work with. Adam drained and pressured  washed our pool in less than 5 hours and did a very thorough and detailed job while sharing his knowledge of continued maintenance with us.Then came back and … More

Mr. Graham was very responsive and had an awesome crew of guys come out very timely and unclogged my skimmer lines. Would give 6 stars of if I could. Thank you Response from the owner 5 months ago Thank you for your review i am glad we was able to help you and get the skimmer lines unclogged.
